code: import{ActionTypes}from"../constants/action-types";const intialState={products:[]};export const productsReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:intialState;let{type,payload}=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(type){case ActionTypes.SET_PRODUCTS:return{...state,products:payload};default:return state;}};export const selectedProductsReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let{type,payload}=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;console.log(type);switch(type){case ActionTypes.SELECTED_PRODUCT:return{...state,...payload};case ActionTypes.REMOVE_SELECTED_PRODUCT:return{};default:return state;}};
